headline.main: PEACE OFFENSIVE URGED BY CUDAHY; Ex-Ambassador to Belgium Warns of Thirty Years War' if U.S. Enters Conflict

lead_paragraph: The only hope for a lasting world peace is for the United States to start a peace offensive and negotiate a peace that would be founded on an association of all nations, John Cudahy, former United States Ambassador to Belgium, declared last night at a dinner of the Citizens Peace Petition Committee at the Town Hall Club.
abstract: Citizens Peace Petition Com dinner; peace offensive urged by J Cudahy, J T Flynn, N Thomas and others
snippet: The only hope for a lasting world peace is for the United States to start a peace offensive and negotiate a peace that would be founded on an association of all nations, John Cudahy, former United States Ambassador to Belgium, declared last night ...
